hero.title: Grow with the Best: Your Trusted Mushroom Farm Partner
hero.subtitle: From premium mushroom spawn to expert consultation, we provide everything you need for a successful harvest.
hero.future_of_agriculture: The Future of Agriculture is Here
hero.mission_description: Our mission is to empower farmers and transform the agricultural landscape with cutting-edge technology and sustainable practices. We are building a nationwide network of AI-driven produce centers that cover the entire value chain, from spawn production to value-added products and organic fertilizers.
hero.sustainable_practices_description: We are committed to circular farming methods, including organic waste conversion and eco-friendly packaging, to minimize our environmental impact.
hero.tech_integration_description: Our AI-powered platform optimizes every stage of the mushroom cultivation process, ensuring maximum yield, quality, and profitability.
hero.community_support_description: We provide farmers with comprehensive training, resources, and market access to help them thrive in a competitive industry.

about.title: About Our Mushroom Farm
about.subtitle: Your Source for Premium Quality Mushrooms
about.description: We are dedicated to providing the freshest, highest-quality mushrooms to our customers. Our state-of-the-art farm and sustainable growing practices ensure that you receive a superior product every time. Learn more about our commitment to excellence and the passion that drives us.

products.title: Our Mushroom Products
products.subtitle: Fresh From Our Farm to Your Table
products.oyster_description: Delicious and versatile, our oyster mushrooms are a favorite among chefs and home cooks alike.
products.shiitake_description: Known for their rich, savory flavor, our shiitake mushrooms are perfect for a variety of culinary uses.
products.lions_mane_description: A unique and flavorful mushroom with a texture similar to seafood.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Supporting Your Mushroom Cultivation Journey
services.spawn_description: We provide high-quality mushroom spawn to get your cultivation started right.
services.consultation_description: Our experts offer guidance on everything from farm setup to harvesting techniques.
services.training_description: Learn the art and science of mushroom cultivation with our hands-on training programs.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have a question or want to place an order? Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Name
contact.form_description: Ready to transform your agricultural venture? Contact our team of experts for consultation, product inquiries, or partnership opportunities.
contact.form_subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.form_footer: By submitting this form, you agree to our privacy policy and terms of service.

services_page.subheader: From advanced mushroom cultivation to precision farming, we offer a complete suite of services to help you build and scale a successful agricultural enterprise.
services_page.spawn_labs_description: State-of-the-art spawn production facilities for a variety of mushroom species, ensuring high-yield and disease-free cultivation.
services_page.composting_description: Advanced systems that convert organic waste into premium, nutrient-rich compost for optimal mushroom growth.
services_page.farming_description: Climate-controlled facilities for commercial mushroom farming, designed for maximum yield and year-round production.
services_page.rental_description: Affordable access to a wide range of agricultural machinery and equipment, tailored to regional farming needs.
services_page.solutions_description: Modernize your farm with our hydroponics, polyhouse, and drip irrigation systems for efficient resource management.
services_page.monitoring_description: Comprehensive soil analysis, including NPK levels and pH, plus weather station setup for data-driven farming decisions.
services_page.consulting_description: Our experts provide comprehensive support to establish and scale your agricultural venture, from initial setup to full-scale operation. We help you integrate advanced technologies for a future-proof farming business.
services_page.benefit1_desc: We cover the entire value chain, from spawn production to market access, providing a one-stop solution for your farming needs.
services_page.benefit2_desc: Our AI-powered platform and advanced automation ensure efficiency, higher yields, and data-driven decisions.
services_page.benefit3_desc: Our team of agronomists, engineers, and market specialists is dedicated to your success, providing ongoing guidance and support.
services_page.how_it_works_step1_desc: We start with a detailed assessment of your goals, resources, and land to develop a customized project plan.
services_page.how_it_works_step2_desc: Our engineers design and install the optimal systems for your needs, whether it's a mushroom farm, hydroponics, or monitoring tools.
services_page.how_it_works_step3_desc: We manage the full implementation and provide hands-on training to ensure your team is proficient with the new technology.
services_page.how_it_works_step4_desc: We provide continuous monitoring, support, and market linkages to help you scale your operations and maximize profitability.
services_page.marketplace_description: Connecting farmers directly with buyers, our upcoming AI-powered marketplace will provide transparent pricing, streamlined logistics, and secure transactions to create a more efficient and profitable agricultural ecosystem.

about_page.title: About Our Mushroom Farm
about_page.description: We are dedicated to providing the freshest, highest-quality mushrooms to our customers. Our state-of-the-art farm and sustainable growing practices ensure that you receive a superior product every time. Learn more about our commitment to excellence and the passion that drives us.
about_page.vision_description: To establish produce centers across India that cover the full value chain — from seed and spawn to farming, value-added products, and fertilizers — all powered by a single AI-driven platform. Each hub will drive agricultural innovation with consulting, equipment rental, precision farming, marketplace services, and real-time insights to help farmers and partners grow sustainably and profitably.
about_page.core_service1: Mushroom spawn lab and indoor composting units
about_page.core_service5: Soil health monitoring and weather stations
about_page.value1_description: Pioneering advanced agricultural technologies and sustainable farming practices across India.
about_page.value2_description: Creating a nationwide network of AI-driven produce centers revolutionizing agriculture from farm to marketplace.
about_page.value3_description: Maintaining the highest standards in mushroom cultivation, processing, and agricultural consulting.
about_page.value4_description: Empowering farmers with cutting-edge technology and comprehensive support systems.

products_page.title: Our Mushroom Products
products_page.subtitle: Fresh From Our Farm to Your Table
products_page.value_chain_description: Experience the full spectrum of our mushroom cultivation expertise. From spawn to finished products, we maintain the highest quality standards throughout the entire production process.
products_page.oyster_description: Delicious and versatile, our button mushrooms are a favorite among chefs and home cooks alike.
products_page.shiitake_description: Known for their rich, savory flavor, our shiitake mushrooms are perfect for a variety of culinary uses.
products_page.lions_mane_description: A unique and flavorful mushroom with a texture similar to seafood.
products_page.fertilizer_description: High-quality organic fertilizer made from used mushroom compost, rich in nutrients for soil health.
products_page.cta_description: Get in touch with our team to discuss bulk orders, custom packaging, or distribution partnerships. We're here to meet your specific requirements.

footer.company_description: Revolutionizing Indian agriculture through innovative mushroom cultivation, precision farming technologies, and sustainable agricultural solutions. Building a nationwide network of produce centers for the future of farming.

careers.description: Join our mission to revolutionize agriculture with AI-powered solutions. Explore roles in research, technology, farming, and operations.

research.title: Research & Development
research.description: Our R&D team drives innovation in controlled-environment farming, sustainable practices, and AI-driven agricultural insights.

quality.title: Quality Standards
quality.description: We follow strict quality protocols to ensure the highest standards in spawn, produce, and value-added products.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Sustainability is at the core of our work. From organic fertilizers to circular farming practices, we help build a greener future.
